dialogue.speaker: Lulù
text: ...Pippi?
You really came all this way just to find me?
You shouldn't have. I could've handled this myself.

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: Maybe you could have.
But I couldn't let you face it alone.
I didn't come because I thought you needed saving.
I came because I still love you.

dialogue.speaker: Lulù
text: After everything… you still hold on to that?
Pippi, people move on. Feelings change. That's just life.
You'll suffer if you keep loving me this way.

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: Maybe I will suffer. But pain is nothing compared to betraying what I believe in.
I don't love you out of habit or stubbornness.
I love you because you're still the most beautiful
the most alive, the most brilliant person I've ever known.
That hasn't changed
and until it does, I won't pretend it has.

dialogue.speaker: Lulù
text: But you'll end up alone, stuck in something that doesn't exist anymore.
You can't live chained to a memory.
You have to let life happen again, even if it means loving in a different way.

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: I don't want to love in a different way.
I don't want to tell someone else the same words I told you
words I meant with all I had.
If I start making promises to everyone, what meaning do they have?
I gave everything so it would last
because I believed in forever when I said it.
If that belief makes me alone, then so be it.

dialogue.speaker: Lulù
text: You talk as if love were a vow written in stone.
But people change. I've changed.
Don't you ever want peace? To stop hurting?

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: Peace isn't my goal, Lulù.
Living honestly is.
What I feel doesn't need to be returned or validated. It's mine.
As long as I see the light in you
your strength, your warmth, your kindness
I'll love you.
And if one day that light fades, then it ends.
But until that day, I'll stay true to it.

dialogue.speaker: Lulù
text: You're impossible. . .
i must think about myself
I can't follow the way you love me.

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: You don't have to.
This isn't about holding you back.
I just need you to understand
I promised, I meant it, regardless
if my purpose is not to be the one
then it's to be a living reminder that you are perfect just as you are

dialogue.speaker: Lulù
text: . . .You're still the same.
And somehow, that's comforting.
Come on. Let's go. This place is falling apart.

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: Yeah.
Let's get out of here.
